id: Notion E-commence website checklist for design and development
name: Notion E-commence website checklist for design and development
description: Use this checklist to help design and build an e-commerce website. It covers all the essential pages and features, providing designers and developers with a clear guide to ensure nothing is overlooked. This easy-to-use template is adaptable to platforms like WooCommerce, Shopify, or Magento and will help you plan, organize, and deliver a well-structured online store.Flexible PricingDownload the template for free or leave a small donation. Choose a price that suits your budget. Your support helps
features: Added "Product metadata" to the Product Detail Page, thanks Kay for the suggestion
